Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AbstractOctree< T, VEC >This is the class for perfect octree tree, 3 levels,
AbstractRK4IntegratorSimple base class to do RK4 integration this class then needs the motionFunction to be implemented so we can integrate the values
BoundingBox
ClothThis class creates the cloth according to mass-spring model it updates the cloth with respect to the internal spring forces and the external force acting on the cloth the mass particle(connecting the springs) states are updated using the RK4 integrator
ClothParticle
ClothSpring
GLWindowOur main glwindow widget for NGL applications all drawing elements are put in this file the cloth is created, drawn in this class. it is updated in the timer function and checks for collisions between the cloth and the meshes
